name: Arcane Sash of Warding
description: A shimmering silk sash woven with protective enchantments and mystical energy channels

special_properties.ward_weaver: Increases effectiveness of protective spells by 12%
special_properties.mystical_storage: Enchanted pockets hold twice normal capacity
special_properties.energy_focus: Reduces mana costs for belt-stored spell components by 10%

flavor_text: Crafted in the Celestial Workshops of the Arcane University, this sash pulses with gentle cyan light that responds to the wearer's magical aura. The silver threads form intricate ward patterns that have protected countless mages through their studies and adventures.

metadata.author: PrimalMyst Development Team
metadata.notes: Example energy shield type belt with Zeusara alignment
